summary: The Personnel Oversight and Shift Tracking Act of 2025 (POST Act) mandates the Director of the Federal Protective Service to improve oversight, performance, and accountability of contract security personnel protecting federal buildings. This includes establishing data collection standards for covert testing, conducting analytical reviews, developing corrective training, and updating security guidance. The bill also requires evaluation and potential modernization of the personnel tracking system, along with reports to Congress on the implementation and its effectiveness.
